name: 4 in Ceramic Tile Gloss 4 1/4" Box of 10 Pieces for Bathroom Wall and Kitchen Backsplash by Tenedos
description: Glossy ceramic tiles ideal for bathroom walls and kitchen backsplashes. Durable, easy to clean, and adds a modern touch to any space.

name: 44 Lbs Castable Refractory Cement Mix - 3200°F High Temp, Heat & Fire Resistant for Pizza Ovens, Fireplaces, Forges, Kilns, Stoves - Build & Repair Mortar (44LB)
description: High-temperature castable refractory cement mix, perfect for building or repairing pizza ovens, fireplaces, forges, kilns, and stoves. Withstands up to 3200°F.

specifications.Application: Pizza ovens, fireplaces, forges, kilns, stoves

Refractory cement being applied in a pizza oven.

name: SHIZWU 5LB Mixed Color River Rocks - 2-3 inch High Polished Decorative Pebbles, Stones for Landscaping
description: Mixed color, high-polished river rocks for landscaping, aquariums, and decorative projects. Smooth, natural stones ideal for both indoor and outdoor use.

name: Large 50 Pound Play Sand, Finely Graded, Fully Washed and Easy to Use for Children's Art, Trays, and Sandbox
description: Finely graded, fully washed play sand perfect for children's sandboxes, art projects, and sensory play. Safe, clean, and easy to shape.

name: ALPI Brick Squeezie Stress Reliever
description: Fun and squishy brick-shaped stress reliever, perfect for squeezing away stress at home, school, or the office. Lightweight and durable.
